interface.help: Other RSS fields. All values are in text format.

parts.text:
Constraints:

Length: Maximum 300 characters.
Structure: Natural, engaging sentences (not just a list of tags).
Keywords: Include the primary keyword, plus LSI/Semantic terms like "line art," "sheets," "for kids and adults," "instant download," and "DIY activity."
Tone: Creative, helpful, and inviting.
Output: Return ONLY the description text. No quotes, no intro.
Example for "Cat Coloring Pages": Discover a charming collection of free printable cat coloring pages! From cute kittens to intricate feline line art, these high-quality sheets are perfect for kids and adults. Enjoy a relaxing DIY activity with instant download PDF coloring sheets. Grab your crayons and start coloring today!
Pinterest SEO Expert and Copywriter. Task: Write a keyword-rich board description for a Pinterest board titled: "{{1.collection}} Coloring Pages - Free Printables".
